title: Super clean quiet living ... 1 bedroom 1 bath... private laundry
posting_body: ['if you are looking for a super clean ...nice ...super nice units...AND are ready to settle into a nice place...look no further...', 'big unit ...', 'private laundry and storage ...you will not be disappointed!', '(pics of similar 2 bed unit)', 'YOU MUST have 2 of these 3 things going for you....good credit/score... or good rent or mortgage history or solid dependable income.', 'WHICH 2 DO YOU HAVE?', ' WILL FLEX WITH GOOD REASON AND PROOF..', '(CALLS ONLY DURING THE week and DAYTIME (10-4)', "CALL WITH which TWO OF THESE YOU HAVE, and your name and mention **clinton twp** and best time to call you and I'll call back to discuss.", 'LEAVE YOUR NUMBER!!!!!!!', '(my call to you may show blocked number during the day) or email with your daytime phone number (no reply emails will be replied by email)', '**all discounts applied**', 'keywords: condo , rental , rent , townhouse , 3 bedroom']
